abstract.p: Correction of July 24 entry in Addenda listing of Media Business page about choice of Young & Rubicam Advertising by Pennzoil-Quaker State International as its international agency, concerning company's agency roster in US

block.p: An entry in the Addenda listing of the Media Business page on Monday about the choice of Young & Rubicam Advertising by Pennzoil-Quaker State International as its international agency of record referred imprecisely to the company's agency roster in the United States. GSD&M in Austin, Tex., part of the Omnicom Group, creates ads for Pennzoil motor oil, but those for Quaker State in the United States are created by the Tucker Partnership in New York.
